div.bibl: Abstynent, Vol. I, No. 2, May, 1911. THE THIRD OF MAY BROTHERHOOD OF TEETOTALERS IN CHICAGO

body.p: Three years ago in 1908 when the professor and philosopher V. Lutoslawski came to United States, he organized the Third of May Brotherhood of Teetotalers in Chicago, named after the anniversary of the Polish constitution of May 3rd.
Twenty members of both sexes joined this new association.
